entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or drizzle and a few flurries changing to periods of snow this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
